lyric:
[00:00.000] 作曲 : Richard Carpenter and John Bettis
[00:00.959] 作词 : Richard Carpenter and John Bettis
[00:02.879]When i was young i'd listen to the radio
[00:08.918]waiting for my favorite songs
[00:14.559]When they played i'd sing along,
[00:19.259]it made me smile.
[00:23.909]Those were such happy times and not so long ago
[00:32.298]how i wondered where they'd gone.
[00:37.890]But they're back again just like a long lost friend
[00:43.979]all the songs i love so well.
[00:49.239]Every shalala every wo'wo
[00:55.829]still shines.
[01:01.679]Every shing-a-ling-a-ling
[01:04.249]that they're starting
[01:06.990]to sing so fine
[01:13.119]When they get to the part
[01:15.669]Where he's breaking her heart
[01:19.900]It can really make me cry
[01:24.200]just like before.
[01:29.289]It's yesterday once more.
[01:38.890](shoobie do lang lang)
[01:42.178]Looking back on how it was in years gone by
[01:47.828]and the good times that I had
[01:54.190]makes today seem rather sad,
[01:58.349]so much has changed.
[02:07.390]It was songs of love that i would sing to them
[02:11.228]and i'd memorise each word.
[02:16.168]Those old melodies still sound so good to me
[02:23.198]as they melt the years away
[02:29.390]every shalala every wo'wo still shines
[02:39.998]every shing-a-ling-a-ling
[02:42.327]that they're startingto sing
[02:45.648]so fine
[02:51.577]all my best memorise come back clearly to me
[02:56.868]Some can even make me cry
[03:01.879]just like before.
[03:07.698]It's yesterday once more.
[03:10.659](shoobie do lang lang)
[03:14.898]Every shalala every wo'wo still shines.
[03:26.238]Every shing-a-ling-a-ling
[03:29.398]that they're starting to sing
[03:31.668]so fine
[03:36.898]Every shalala every wo'wo still shines.
tlyric:
[by:幼稚园的大儿童]
[00:02.879]当我年轻时， 常听收音机，
[00:08.918]等待心爱的歌曲。
[00:14.559]听到播放时便随声歌唱。
[00:19.259]这使我欢畅。
[00:23.909]那时多么幸福的时刻！就在不久以前。
[00:32.298]我想知道他们曾去何处，
[00:37.890]但我所有深爱的歌曲 他们现在又回来，
[00:43.979]正如老友失散又重聚。
[00:49.239]每一句wo-wo
[00:55.829]仍闪烁，
[01:01.679]每一句shinga-linga-ling，
[01:04.249]他们又开始
[01:06.990]唱得如此动听。
[01:13.119]当他们唱到一个地方
[01:15.669]令她伤心断肠，
[01:19.900]这真能叫我哭出来，
[01:24.200]正如从前一样，
[01:29.289]仿佛昔日又重来
[01:38.890]无比惆怅
[01:42.178]回头看岁月如何消逝

[01:58.349]变化多大啊
[02:07.390]我向他们唱爱的歌曲。
[02:11.228]我会记住每一句歌词。
[02:16.168]那些古老的曲调，在我听来还是那么好，
